entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ITMS-91061: Missing privacy manifest #28262
  • ObjCRuntime.RuntimeException Failed to marshal the Objective-C object 0x1367c9900 (type: Microsoft_Maui_Platform_MauiTextField) #28261
  • [Bug] iOS: On-Demand Resource Tag not available to be set #28260

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • fix-27998 - [Windows] ScrollView is not scrolling to the bottom if in grid with *,auto Width #28258
    community ✨
  • Fix: OnIdiom Default Value Handling for ValueType Properties #28257
    community ✨
  • [Android] DatePicker not respecting UserAppTheme - fix #28256
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker

Updated

  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix Incorrect Scrolling Behavior in CollectionView ScrollTo Method Using Index Value #27246
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Added a support for GradientBrushes on Shape.Stroke #22208
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨
  • [Android] Flyout Page - support for a custom flyout icon #22099
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    area-layout, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
